display_name: Overall RDI at 2% desat or arousal
description: RDI at 2% desat or arousal  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas with arousal associated with >= 2% desat) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: rdi2pa = 60*(hremba2 +hroa2 + hnrba2 + hnroa2 +carba2+ caroa2 + canba2 + canoa2 +oarba2 +oaroa2 + oanba2 +oanoa2) / slpprdp

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall RDI at 2% desat or arousal
